link-sent.content-1: We have sent a link for you to change your flight details to
link-sent.content-2: Check your spam or junk folder if you can't find the email in your inbox.

evw-expired.content: You can no longer download your electronic visa waiver. This is because it is for a travel date in the past and has expired.

evw-not-verified.header: Electronic visa waiver not yet verified
evw-not-verified.content: Your application is still awaiting verification. We will email you as soon as your current application has been processed.
